title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4222.9 - Post time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4222.9 - Post time

State Regulations

Post time is the time designated by the judges at which
horses are to arrive at the post for each race; and such time shall be shown on
the dial provided for that purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4222.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
